channel.title: CVE Feed for Huawei -- Mate10
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Huawei -- Mate10

item.title: CVE-2019-5219|2024-08-04T19:47:56.756Z -- huawei -- mate10
item.description: There is a double free vulnerability on certain drivers of Huawei Mate10 smartphones versions earlier than ALP-AL00B 9.0.0.181(C00E87R2P20T8). An attacker tricks the user into installing a malicious application, which makes multiple processes operate the same resource at the same time. Successful exploit could cause a denial of service condition.
